usageHeading: Start an SQL REPL in your terminal with pipe support
args: <file> Path to the sql file to import

options.description: Remote database server url to connect to [default: ws://localhost:8000] [aliases: conn]
The database selected for the operation [env: SURREAL_DATABASE=] [aliases: db]
TThe namespace selected for the operation [env: SURREAL_NAMESPACE=] [aliases: ns]
Database authentication password to use when connecting [env: SURREAL_PASS=] [aliases:pass]
Database authentication username to use when connecting [env: SURREAL_USER=] [aliases:user]
Whether database responses should be pretty printed
Whether to emit results in JSON
Whether omitting semicolon causes a newline
